title: Establishment of the Hawaii criminal justice data center
context: §846-2 Establishment of the Hawaii criminal justice data center. There shall be a data center, to be known as the &ldquo;Hawaii criminal justice data center&rdquo;, established in the department of the attorney general. The data center shall be directed and managed by an administrator appointed by the attorney general subject to chapter 76. [L 1979, c 129, pt of §2; am L 1980, c 269, §2; am L 1982, c 57, §1; am L 1983, c 78, §3(4); am L 1985, c 165, §2; am L 1986, c 65, §1; am L 1987, c 146, §3; am L 2000, c 253, §150]
